column4: hi, while at uni I messed with alot of my repos file and stuff due to the proxy lan they had.
is there a way for me to get ubuntu back to factory settings without a reinstall?
is that a command for the terminal?

a good way to set that up is when you initially install you set up three partitions instead of two, one for /root, one for /home and one for your swap, then you can just purge your /root without losing anything :)
